title: Strategic Administrator
job_overview:
Purpose of the Role
The Strategic Administrator exists to drive clarity, structure, and seamless execution across communication and coordination functions. This role ensures the strategic rhythm of the organisation stays aligned with our mission of empowering 25,000 students annually by 2030.

With a focus on precision, responsiveness, and continuous improvement, the Strategic Administrator supports leadership and project Upgrade to see actual infontum by managing email systems, meetings, projects, and essential administrative functions. This role is critical in translating strategic intent into operational action—ensuring nothing falls through the cracks and everything moves forward with intention and impact

Core Responsibilities
1. Email Management

Maintain clear inboxes using structured systems (flag, file, follow-up).

Prioritise, delegate, and escalate emails as needed for effective response.

Draft replies and summaries for leadership when appropriate.

2. Project & Task Management

Maintain project and task boards (e.g., ClickUp, Asana, Trello).

Assign tasks, track progress, and follow up on deliverables.

Create simple, repeatable processes for task flow and team visibility.

3. Communication – Phone Calls

Make and answer calls on behalf of leadership.

Capture and summarise key information from conversations.

Follow through with actions, notes, or scheduling from calls.

4. Meeting Coordination & Documentation

Plan and confirUpgrade to see actual infoetings, sending reminders and agendas.

Take clear, action-oriented minutes.

Track and follow up on meeting actions across teams.

5. General Administration

Prepare documents, templates, and presentations aligned with brand tone.

Manage digital filing systems and data hygiene.

Support scheduling, form submissions, and other day-to-day operations.

Success in This Role Looks Like
Zero email chaos – priority items are flagged and responded to promptly.

Projects stay on track – you know what’s next, who’s doing it, and when it’s due.

Leaders stay focused – you're their behind-the-scenes partner keeping things moving.

Meetings turn into action – not just talk.

Everything is simple, repeatable, and efficient.

Who You Are
Proactive and organised with an eye for structure.

Confident communicator who thrives on clarity and follow-through.

Tech-savvy and comfortable with digital tools and systems.

Values-driven: integrity, initiative, and no-fuss service.

Loves being the steady force that keeps the ship sailing smoothly.


If you would like to be considered please ensure you include a 2 Minute Video telling us a little bit about yourself and why you woudl like to work for Onsitetraining Australia.

Applications that do not provide this 2 Minute video will not be reviewed.
